title: The Great Wish - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Beautiful Female Lead   Character Growth   Cold Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Divination   Dreams   Empires   Enemies Become Lovers   Female Protagonist   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Hard-Working Protagonist   Kingdoms   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Politics   Possessive Characters   Pragmatic Protagonist   Pregnancy   R-18   Royalty   Schemes And Conspiracies   Second Chance   Secret Identity   Strong Love Interests
author: Covering The Sky   하늘가리기
description:
The Empire’s one and only princess. 

She had everything within her grasp from the moment she was born: a keen intellect, superior talents, even the position as the heir to the throne. One day, before her twentieth birthday, she begins to have dreams. These dreams show her the events that are to happen dozens of years later. She believes this foresight is a blessing from the heavens and is thankful for it. 

However, the more she dreams, the stranger they become. The future Sienna envisioned was nothing like this. The half-brother she despised has retaliated. Her mother, who Sienna had believed to be her absolute ally, has a hidden agenda. And finally a man who has great influence over her, both in reality and in her dreams, appears before her. 

Suddenly, everything around her begins to change, transforming her in the process.>
